overview: Locked and loaded with over 6 hours of handgun-happy vigilantes & badass babes of Blaxploitation, ultra-hip heists, spaghetti shoot 'em ups and bitumen burning post-apocalyptic carquakes (not to mention alien close encounters of the horny kind) - DRIVE-IN DELIRIUM: WITH A VENGEANCE is a two-fisted, take-no-prisoners high-def tactical assault that guarantees to make you feel lucky, punk!
title: Drive-In Delirium: With a Vengeance
